headline: Why Is Norwegian Cruise Line (NCLH) Stock Rocketing Higher Today
summary: Shares of cruise company Norwegian Cruise Line (NYSE:NCLH) jumped 6.8% in the afternoon session after comments from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell hinted at a potential early interest rate cut. The broader market rallied, with the travel sector seeing significant gains, following comments from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell at the Jackson Hole symposium hinting at a potential early interest rate cut. headline: How Realistic Are RCL's Perfecta Targets Given 2025 EPS Growth of 31%?
summary: Royal Caribbean's Perfecta plan accelerates as the 2025 EPS projection jumps 31%, fueled by record yields, new ships and surging guest demand.

headline: Is Carnival Stock Still Attractive After Surging 89% and Upbeat 2024 Bookings?
summary: If you have been eyeing Carnival Corporation & as an investment, you are not alone. With its ticker, CCL, making notable waves recently, plenty of traders and long-term holders are wondering if now is the right moment to climb aboard or wait for calmer seas. The stock has been on quite a ride, up nearly 89% over the past year and a stunning 178% over the last three years. While there have been some dips in the past month and week, the broader trend points to changing sentiment about risk and...
